materials.raw_text:
B6: 60 grams 
 Cr: 40 grams 
 Mn: 20 grams 
 Pa: 30 grams

sourcing.instructions:

 Cr: Obtain from an industrial metal supplier or online. 
 Mn: Available from metal alloy suppliers or chemical providers. 
 Pa: Source from specialty material suppliers or online retailers.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 60 grams of B6 and place it in a clean mixing bowl. 
 2. Add 40 grams of Cr to the bowl. 
 3. Incorporate 20 grams of Mn into the mixture. 
 4. Finally, add 30 grams of Pa. 
 5. Use a spatula to thoroughly mix until all components are evenly distributed.
